title: [K-12] Augmented Reality (AR)-Based Project Learning for Higher Education STEM Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theories and experience utilizing digital tools
context.additional_context: Learners develop prototypes using AR technology to solve real scientific problems, collaborating and engaging in self-directed learning in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Virtual simulation models of physical science laboratory equipment can be designed using AR technology
AR-based data visualization and interactive systems can be implemented for STEM problem-solving
Learners can collaborate with team members in PBL environments to develop AR solutions and receive project evaluations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
